reviews.review_msg: Prof. Allen has great lectures and gives homework relevant to them, so if you attend class and do the weekly assignments, you should be fine. He uses humour and real-life examples to explain the material, and although his exams are somewhat difficult, they are fair. Overall, a great professor.
Literally, his way of teaching is phenomenal. very charismatic and relates the material to the students with personal real-life examples. He's controversial for sure, but all in the right way.
A very good profthe test is super easy, the class is also straightforward, highly recommended.
